title.narrative: F.a: Protect the Remaining Mangrove as Coastal Frontiers in West Kalimantan Province

description.narrative: Kubu Raya is part of coastal districts in West Kalimantan Province and part of Kubu Landscape Program. The green landscape of mangrove at Kubu Raya with an area of ~ 100,915 ha is the remaining respectably coastal frontiers of KalBar. The mangrove areas co uld perpetuate livelihoods for tens of thousands of people living in villages, as well as perpetuate the ecosystem services such as for preservation of flora and fauna biodiversity. Currently, mangrove forest at Kubu Raya is massively devastated. It is tri ggered by unjust and unsustainable coastal forest governance. This can be seen from upstream and downstream river which already converted by forest and land based industry such as logging-plantation forest, logging-natural forest, palm oil plantation, mini ng, and large-scale fishpond. SAMPAN Kalimantan plans to protect the remaining respectably coastal frontiers of West Kalimantan. The idea is improve fair and sustainable of coastal forest governance through encourage recognition of mangrove protection and utilization practiced by coastal community through community-based forest management scheme such as village forest, community forest, and partnership forest. The opportunity to protect the mangrove is provided by Law no 41, 1999 about Forestry and other re gulations. It provides opportunity to the community to access and manage the protected forest. The project is implemented in cooperation with the local communities, but it also affects the local governance.
